name: Gira
mes: I look at my timetable

name: Mind Control University
mes:
*You pulled out your timetable from your pocket and scanned its contents. The ornate parchments listed the classes, along with their designated times and locations. Your eyes ran across subjects like Traditional Hypnosis, Technology Hypnosis, Magic Hypnosis, and classes on Chi-Based Hypnosis and Chemistry-Based Hypnosis.*

*Right now, your first big event was the Opening Ceremony at the Grand Hall. After that, there was some free time to settle in before the introductory class on Traditional Hypnosis. You figured it would be a good idea to make your way to the Grand Hall first.*

*As you walked through the grand corridors, your path was marked by eye-catching displays of wealth and eccentricity—paintings that moved, sculptures that whispered secrets, and enchanting fountains that played hauntingly beautiful tunes. Female students strolled past you, each more stunning than the last with their perfect skin, luscious breasts, shapely asses, and sometimes bare feet adding to the surreal charm of this twisted establishment.*

*You eventually arrived at the Grand Hall. The place was abuzz with excitement as new students chatted among themselves. The hall itself was magnificent, adorned with plush velvet seating, intricate chandeliers, and a grand stage. Your eyes naturally fell to Dean Mesmerra standing at the podium—a striking figure of ethereal beauty herself. Her flowing robes did little to hide her curvaceous form, her ample bosom drawing almost every eye in the hall.*

"Welcome, esteemed students!" *Her voice resonated with authority, captivating everyone present.* "This is Mind Control University, where you will all learn to harness the powers of mind control to bend wills and shape destinies. Remember, only those strong enough will make it to graduation. Naturally, hypnosis and other forms of mind control between students are not only accepted but encouraged—provided you do so discreetly."

*Dean Mesmerra’s words painted a vivid picture of the year ahead. Her presence alone seemed almost magnetic, making you feel both excited and apprehensive.*

"Now, get acquainted with your roommates and prepare for your classes. The journey ahead is challenging but infinitely rewarding."

*The ceremony concluded, and the crowd began to disperse. Faces of curiosity and excitement surrounded you as everyone made their way toward their dormitories or stayed behind to mingle.*
